title: How Far Can the Grizzlies Go? And What Now For the Hawks? | The Answer
description:
Chris and Seerat discuss the advantages and pitfalls that can affect the younger teams in the NBA, notably the Memphis Grizzlies and Atlanta Hawks, whose trajectories appear to be crossing at this point of the season.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Production Assistant: Chris Sutton
